actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior to reinstate oil and gas leases Idaho 016790, Idaho 016791, Idaho 016792, Idaho 016793, Idaho 016813 and Idaho 017371.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to reinstate six specified oil and gas leases upon petition by a named corporation.

titles.title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Interior to reinstate oil and gas leases Idaho 016790, Idaho 016791, Idaho 016792, Idaho 016793, Idaho 016813 and Idaho 017371.
